meanings.definition: To spell better than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She always outspells her classmates in the spelling bee.
meanings.sent2: The champion outspells all the other contestants in the competition.
meanings.sent3: The spelling wizard outspells everyone with ease.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to outspells others is like a shining beacon of talent.
meanings.sent5: Watching her outspells others is truly impressive.

meanings.sent1: He outspells his friends in every spelling test.
meanings.sent2: The expert outspells the amateurs effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The cat outspells the dog in spelling words backwards.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to outspells her rivals is unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The way she outspells others is truly remarkable.
